info.name: Bing Dark Theme
info.description: This style gives you a full on dark themed experience for bing.com (the official search engine for Windows by Microsoft that comes default on edge).
info.additionalInfo:
Release v1.2.2

This is a release version, bugs are **not** to be expected, a GitHub repository will be created shortly where you can report issues, until then please report issues in the comments.

| Updated
+ URLs when searching
+ Search background when selecting text
